item.title: Watsons stores in Singapore are offering a variety of Christmas gift sets
item.description:
Watsons Singapore offers a variety of boxed Christmas gift sets, ideal for office Secret Santa gift exchanges. These sets include toiletries, travel accessories, and even a coffee mug. ](https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEjuFQqRo_4KdJEEAt15qa83slFSXiCLkOhVqNapfI1b4jkE6ukFQPhs1wRGbVAowuWpJ4UwAN_fCdEHchVu3DPtpFMtEedEO6vXFbR06xUcMG0stNQ2hbT_c0NaucfCCoJVqEoT4RiWifek/s1600/watsons+spaa+reviving+collection.JPG) Source: Watsons. The Spaa Reviving Collection. The Spaa Reviving Collection (S$15.90) allows you to create a spa experience at home. It includes aloe vera extract and pro vitamin B5 to calm both your senses and skin. The set contains a 150ml body wash, 100ml body lotion, 100ml body scrub, 50g bath fizzer, and a body puff...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/watsons-stores-in-singapore-are-offering-a-variety-of-christmas-gift-sets/
